tool.name: MaskBuilder

param.name: input_directory
param.dialogReference:
Input data directory of the MODIS product. Data directory should contain the science dataset including necessary quality bands and bands to be masked. All bands should be available as individual GeoTIFF files with the "tif" extension and band names should be identifiable using file name suffixes.

Example band file name suffixes:

Quality Assuarance band: QA (file name: 16Jan01QA.tif )

Pixel Reliability band : PR (file name: 16Jan01PR.tif )

NDVI band : NDVI (file name: 16Jan01NDVI.tif )

param.name: output_directory
param.dialogReference: Directory to store generated masked data

param.name: mask_suffix
param.dialogReference:
File name suffix for mask images if they are saved.

ex: mask

param.name: mask_conditions
param.expression: Condition {Band Suffix} {Starting Bit} {Ending Bit} {Value Type} {Value(s)};Condition {Band Suffix} {Starting Bit} {Ending Bit} {Value Type} {Value(s)}...
param.dialogReference:
Primary masking conditions based on quality data.

Condition - unique condition names ex: Condition1

Band Suffix - file name suffix for each quality band ex: QA

Starting Bit/ Ending Bit - position of the bit word within the bit string

Starting Bit ex: 2 Ending Bit ex: 5

Value Type - type of the value ex: Bit Range

Value(s) - Single value or comma separated values, ranges should be specified as <min value, max value>

Bit Range ex: 0000,0100 Integer List ex: 1,2,4

param.name: default_conditional_operator
param.dialogReference: Default conditional operator to integrate conditions into one final rule. But the final rule can be customized using "AND", "OR", "XOR", "NOT", "(" and ")" operators.

param.name: mask_rule
param.dialogReference:
Final rule built using the sepcified conditions. The final rule can be customized using "AND", "OR", "XOR", "NOT", "(" and ")" operators.

ex: Condition1 OR (NOT Condition2 AND Condition3)

Condition1 OR NOT(Condition2 AND Condition3)

param.name: bands_masked
param.dialogReference: Comma separated band name suffixes of the bands to be masked

tool.summary: Builds masks for MODIS datasets using quality assurance data and user specified rules.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Builds masks for MODIS datasets using quality assurance data and user specified rules.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Udaya Jayawardhana,</br> Human-Environment Systems Research Center, Boise State University
